home.title: Autobahn Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Autobot, the Solo Mode opponent of Autobahn.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the task and action card decks of Autobot and manages the difficulty levels.

difficultyLevel.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyLevel.increaseDifficulty1: Autobot’s Trucks move 1 additional space every turn
difficultyLevel.increaseDifficulty2: Autobot gets 1 Development Track step each time one of your Trucks drive past one of its Service Stations
difficultyLevel.increaseDifficulty3: Autobot moves on the Development Track if it skips its turn
difficultyLevel.increaseDifficulty4: Autobot gains more promotions at the end of each era (1/1/2)
difficultyLevel.increaseDifficulty5: Autobot gains more promotions at the end of each era (1/2/2)

setupAutobot.title: Prepare Autobot
setupAutobot.twoPlayers: Set up the game for 2 players.
setupAutobot.pickPlayerColor: Pick a player colour for Autobot. Autobot uses the 25 Employees, 8 Service Stations, 1 Development token of that player colour. Instead of taking a Truck for that colour, Autobot takes 1 Truck and 1 Development token in each of the other, unused colours.
setupAutobot.setupAutobotComponents: Set up Autobot’s components and play area as follows:
setupAutobot.placeSoloBoard: Place the {soloBoard} in Autobot’s play area.
setupAutobot.chooseDeliveryBoard: Randomly choose a Delivery board for Autobot and place it next to the Solo board.
setupAutobot.placeEmployees: Place Autobot’s 25 Employees beside the Solo board.
setupAutobot.placeServiceStations: Place Autobot’s 8 Service Stations on the appropriate spaces of the Solo board.
setupAutobot.placeDevelopmentToken: Place Autobot’s Development token on the first space of the Development Track.
setupAutobot.placeBlackConstructionOffice: Autobot is the start player, so place 1 of Autobot’s Employees onto the first (leftmost) seat of the black Construction Office. Place one of yours on the next seat.
setupAutobot.setupPlayerPlayArea: Set up your play area as normal, and reveal 2 Route cards from the deck. Pick one for yourself and discard the other one. Return the unused route cards back to the box. Autobot does not have a Route card.
setupAutobot.winePickCard: Wine Module: You randomly pick one of the wine cards for yourself, and place the remaining three next to the solo board.
setupAutobot.unlimitedBudget: Autobot has an unlimited budget. You do not need to track Autobot’s income or expenditure.
